name: Fullscreen
description: Open the client in the fullscreen mode

name: Unlimited FPS
description: Uncaps FPS for better performance. Works only on Windows

name: Discord RPC Join Button
description: Allows players to join your game from your Discord profile

name: Toggle Modal Hint
description: The hint to open the menu modal will be placed on the main menu in the bottom right corner

name: Toggle K/D Ratio
description: K/D ratio will be shown in-game near kills and deaths

name: Proxy Domain
description: Choose a proxy domain in case kirka.io is blocked in your region

name: Enable Custom Keybinding
description: Setting multiple options to the same key might lead to unpredictable behavior

name: Enable Resource Swapper
description: Enables resource swapper which replaces game assets with local ones

name: Enable Fast CSS
description: Fast CSS will allow you to customize the game via CSS
